title: Babba86
author: Babba86
content: Dear bitcointalk community,After running really bad at GG poker for a month i decided to look for another casino. After reading about BC.game in bitcointalk i got curious and decided to open a account 22 of october. I deposited 800usd in eth and played only 4 hands with baccarat. All of the hands where Max bet and quickly had a balance of approx 12k. I decided to withdraw the amount and now the problem arised. I logged in to my account the next day and saw that my withdrawal was placed back in my account. No notification in email or messages. I had to get in touch with their live chat in order to understand what was happening. And this was what i got:Hello there, we need to verify some further details from you. Due to this, your withdrawal permissions have been temporarily disabled. You also cannot tip, drop or rain whilst this restriction is on your account. However, you can still play all the games as normal. To begin the verification process, please send us an email to support@bc.game, together with the following information. Subject : Withdrawal Permission OffBCGame UsernameEmail AddressOne Deposit Transaction (TXID)Commonly used IP AddressCommonly used deviceNote - the email must be sent from the email address registered to your BCGame accountKindly wait within 24-72hrs for the core team to respond. Thank you!Note! I cant withdraw, i cant do nothing with the balance exept for playing the games. I then started reading more of the reviews and came across alot of negative reviews from players. In trustpilot it is clearly is written that they have detected many fake reviews from this casino. The way all of this is handled is extremely frustating. I am here highlighting how bc game is operating their casino so the rest of the players dont fall in to the same situation. I have taken screenshots of every transaction in the site. I can upload everything. The one thing i have to say is that i think it is Linda sad that their practise in running casino is not highighted. They clearly make it hard for players to cashout and hold on to their shady practises without anyone printing a finger.I dont care about the funds. What i dont tolarate is getting played. This is my hones review of BC.game. I also demanded a permanent ban. Will never set a foot in that casino again.
